text: The Venerable Robin King in 2013 Robin Lucas Colin King (born 15 February 1959) has been Archdeacon of StanstedDiocese of Chelmsford web-site in the Diocese of Chelmsford since 2013. Born in Quebec, Canada, King was educated at The King's School, Canterbury, Dundee University and Ridley Hall, Cambridge. He was ordained deacon in 1989 and priest in 1990. After a curacy at St Augustine, Ipswich he was Vicar of St Mary, Bures then Rural Dean of Sudbury before his appointment.Collation sermon He was an Honorary Canon of Chelmsford Cathedral from 2008 until 2013. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:People from Quebec Category:People educated at The King's School, Canterbury Category:Alumni of the University of Dundee Category:Alumni of Ridley Hall, Cambridge Category:Archdeacons of Stansted Category:Living people
title: Robin King (priest)
